item.description:
Instead of a night out on the town, how about doing something more relaxing like watching DVDS and eating great snack food provided by... all group members (lol). So here are the details below:

Movies: I will rent two films, but the group majority can select the genre.
So please pick a catagory of film in the questions that follow below..

Food: Potluck, please bring a drink like soda, juice, or better wine!!
Food: like chips n' dip, pizza rolls, or cupcakes. Please let me know what you will bring, in case we have more of one thing then another. If you bring something from your culture even better! See questions below.

Location: At my place... I will send out my address and phone number when it get's closer to the date.

If you want to sign up, but email me what your bringing later, that's cool! Date subject to change:)
item.name: DVDs, Games & Potluck Saturday
